bibl.bibl: Hooker, William Jackson. 1840. Flora Boreali-Americana; or the botany of the northern parts of British America: compiled principally from the plants collected by Dr Richardson & Mr Drummond on the late northern expeditions, under command of Captain Sir John Franklin RN. To which are added … those of Mr Douglas, from north-west America, and of other naturalists. 2 vols. London: Henry G. Bohn.
